entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @SecretaryCarson 📺 Trump Golfs ----> Americans Die!

Nearly 100,000 Americans are dead. With no plan in sight, Donald Trump has decided to hit the golf course.

There's no long term vaccine for any Novel Coronavirus thus, SARS cov2 will not disappear on its own.

https://t.co/ZjVymve7Zc
